df = get_data()
cla = setup_cla()
cla.cov_matrix = risk_models.exp_cov(df).values
w = cla.max_sharpe()
assert isinstance(w, dict)
assert set(w.keys()) == set(cla.tickers)
np.testing.assert_almost_equal(cla.weights.sum(), 1)
np.testing.assert_allclose(cla.portfolio_performance(), (0.3619453128519127,
    0.1724297730592084, 1.9830990135009723))
